titleStmt.title: Majesty in misery, or, An imploration to the King of kings written by His late Majesty King Charles the First in his durance at Carisbrook Castle, 1648.
titleStmt.author: Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.
Wither, George, 1588-1667.

notesStmt.note: Not actually written by Charles I, and often wrongly attributed to George Wither--NUC pre-l956 imprints.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
